Viewing the Folder Menu

The Folder menu is always available on the main StarTeam window, regardless of the component selected from the upper pane. Depending upon the privileges assigned to you and the activities you need to perform, some options may not be enabled.

New

Create a new project folder.

Delete

Delete the selected project folder, its child folders, and/or any working files that correspond to the files in the deleted folders.

Create Working Folders

Create the path to a working folder on your hard drive. Otherwise, if the path to a working folder does not exist on your hard drive, you must create it manually before adding files or checking in files from that working folder.

Properties

Review or change the selected folder’s properties.

Labels...

Assign labels to and/or removes labels from folders.

Advanced

Behavior: Review or change the behavior of the selected folder. You can change its Branch On Change check box or reconfigure the folder as it was at a time in the past. These settings affect the folder only – not its contents.

References: Display the folder references.

Access Rights...: Display or change the folder access rights.

Links

Create Link: Start a link from a selected folder to another item.

Complete Link: Complete the link from a folder to the selected item.

Cancel Link: Stop the process of creating a link.
